Latest version of Flashtools always available @ http://androxyde.github.com/index.html?1354155165000
which includes the necessary drivers.

Great tool for Xperia owners.

Oh yeah, here's the tutorial.  Install Flashtool and necessary USB/ADB Drivers.
Go to your Android Applications settings, and check to allow apps from Unknown Sources.
Go o Applications, Development settings, and check Enable Debugging.
Connect phone to computer and run Flashtool.
When it finishes connecting, click on the padlock icon and wait for Flashtool to do its thing.
Done.
